va-dependency-and-indemnity-compensation: Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) for Child
Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) for Child
Tax-free financial assistance may be available to surviving family members of a service member or a veteran.
The deceased served in the active military, naval, or air service.
discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
died as a result of a service-connected disability or illness,
died while eligible or receiving VA compensation,
You are under 18 years old (under 23 years old if attending a VA-approved school).
